gross-income.label: Gross income
gross-income.helpText: Earning 10,000 a month + 5% in componensation = 10,000 month
gross-income.infoText: This is your total income before any deductions, but excluding pension contributions

pension-percentage.label: Pension %
pension-percentage.helpText: Typically ranges from 5-15% of your gross income
pension-percentage.infoText: This is what you contribute to your pension pot each month without any employer contributions

tax-deduction.label: Tax deduction
tax-deduction.helpText: You can find this on skat.dk or your payslip
tax-deduction.infoText: This is the amount of your gross income, which is not taxed

tax-rate.label: Tax rate
tax-rate.helpText: You can find your tax rate on skat.dk or your payslip
tax-rate.infoText: All earnings above your tax deduction are taxed at 37,06%. Anything above 51.572,5 is taxed at 52,06%.
